abstract: Stocks rise for second day, indicating investor worries about Britain's vote to leave European Union are easing.

headline.print_headline: Dow and S.& P. Climb Into the Black for the Year
headline.main: Dow and S.&.P. Climb Into the Black for the Year

snippet: Stocks were broadly higher, echoing strong gains in global markets as investor worries about Britain’s vote to leave the European Union eased.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were broadly higher, echoing strong gains in global markets as investor worries about Britain’s vote to leave the European Union eased.
